string-array.name: libraryDescriptions
string-array.item: AndroidAnnotations is an Open Source framework that speeds up Android development. It takes care of the plumbing, and lets you concentrate on what\'s really important. By simplifying your code, it facilitates its maintenance.
A library to simply implement card layouts.

Inspired by the quality and variety of XML tooling available for the Java platform (StAX, JAXB, etc.), the Jackson is a multi-purpose Java library for processing JSON data format. Jackson aims to be the best possible combination of fast, correct, lightweight, and ergonomic for developers.\nIt was decided to use Jackson under the terms of the Apache License.
Android library for using the Honeycomb animation API on all versions of the platform back to 1.0!
Spring for Android is an extension of the Spring Framework that aims to simplify the development of native Android applications.

string-array.name: ophaseMoAppointment
string-array.item: Uniführung mit Zwischenstopp in der Mensa

resources.string: In der ersten Beta wurde aus Zeitgründen darauf verzichtet, die Neuigkeitenfunktion zu implementieren. Diese wird baldmöglichst nachgereicht ;)\nIn der Zwischenzeit kannst du die Neuigkeiten auf unserer Seite lesen.
